A man who could have been at work in New Zealand; has not been permitted to work. His fellow-laborers in New Zealand have echoed 


                                  -64- 

your sentiments, which they thought they must carry out. They have made themselves, in connection with you, answerable to God for all that man could have done and did not do. The Lord could have used him to speak and to pray, to help souls that are in suffering need of help.
